title: (x) Staffordshire University - Adobe Garamond, Rold Gold Pretzel, red necktie {Eduardo, Randy}
content:
Please could someone identify the fonts of both parts of this logo.   
   
Thanks ever so much ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126084550im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126084550im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22476.gif)
author: owaters

comments.content: 'Staffordshire' is Adobe Garamond Bold Italic, I think.

And I guess 'University' is [Adobe Garamond Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126084550/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/adobe-garamond/regular/testdrive.html?s=UNIVERSITY&p=48).   
Hard to tell, the sample is so small.

The banner is a [Rold Gold Pretzel](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126084550/http:/www.freshdirect.com/category.jsp;jsessionid=1fKGt3poa5u7NRVlCRl4SEkhvrNAS68UzcHQYWKibxa8r91TeD82!-555093470!171246093!8220!8443!455406885!171246092!8220!8443?catId=gro_snack_pretz&sortBy=name&showThumbnails=true&DisplayPerPage=30&prodCatId=gro_snack_pretz&productId=gro_rold_class_01&trk=trans) on a [red necktie](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126084550/http:/www.wildties.com/dyn/tieview.jsp?id=WT301009&source=cat). Glad I could clear that up.   
   
Randy :-)
